basics.name: Ryan Marks
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Full stack developer with three years of React and Ruby experience in health-tech

work.summary: Lead development of SeamlessMD's medical content management system used by 10 patient educators
highlights: Lead development of SeamlessMD's medical content management system used by 10 patient educators
Implemented a GraphQL Ruby, Apollo, and TypeScript toolchain for whole stack typechecking
Coached a team of four JS+React developers to productivity in Ruby on Rails, Typescript, and GraphQL
Lead change to GitFlow style release managagement, improving quality of releases and improving SOC 2 audits
Designed a "spell checker" for Care Plan content, enabling non-developers to write checks and saving XX hours per year

work.summary: Worked on Akira's patient experience team to deliver virtual healthcare to eight-hundred thousand Canadians using React, Node, and Ruby
highlights: Worked on Akira's patient experience team to deliver virtual healthcare to eight-hundred thousand Canadians
Developed major features with React and Ruby, using Kotlin/Swift to integrate web and mobile apps
Created browser based image processing tools used to extract 100's of new clinician's signatures from photos
Represented development in product meetings to extract implicit requirements and produce dev-ready feature scopes
Operationalized a platform for interactive educational modules, used by 50,000 nursing students globally
Converted an AngularJS proof-of-concept to a modular React app supporting many content modules
Planned and executed a dev-ops strategy to deliver the app and video assets reliably and cost efficiently

work.summary: Worked on a team that developed Adracare's medical practice software using Ruby on Rails and Ember JS
highlights: Developed radiology and medical practice management software using Ruby on Rails and Ember JS
Reverse engineered OAuth and REST APIs using packet analysis to integrate with another medical records system
Integrated clinic phone systems with Adracare, reducing call times and improving patient experience

work.summary: Built and sold bespoke analytics software for investment portfolio managers

publications.name: Gravimetric Dosing Espresso Machine
publications.summary: Augmented a second hand espresso machine with new controls electronics enabling remote control and precise weight based dispensing of espresso. Built using Typescript, Raspberry Pi, and a Breville Dual Boiler

publications.name: Wildfire Alarm System
publications.summary: Wildfire Alarm is a web app and wireless network of sensors to monitor for wildfires. The software was built in a serverless microservices architecture and uses Google Cloud Functions, ML Kit, and  React

publications.name: Software Suppoort for Psychology Research
publications.publisher: McMaster Cognitive Science of Memory and Attention Lab
publications.summary: Lead code reviews with experimental psychologists to identify errors and improve code quality of computer experiments. Automated processing of experiment audio saving 100's of researcher hours.
